task_description: Create a build to implement the features described in @development-plan.md. Please use the specific tasks and subtasks listed in that file to generate your implementation plan.

patterns.criterion_benchmark: MUST use `harness = false` in [[bench]] section, MUST use `std::hint::black_box()` to prevent dead code elimination
patterns.generic_numerics: Use `Float` trait from num-traits, handle `NumCast::from()` with `.ok_or(Error::NumericConversion)`, NEVER `.unwrap()`
patterns.petgraph_dag: `toposort()` returns Result - MUST handle cycle detection explicitly with `CyclicDependency` error
patterns.welford_algorithm: Numerically stable running mean/variance/stddev using delta and delta2 updates
patterns.error_handling: All indicators return `Result<T, Error>`, handle `InsufficientData`, `NumericConversion`, and `CyclicDependency` errors

existing_implementations.description: Greenfield project - no existing code. All patterns from research phase (Criterion, petgraph, num-traits)

critical_dependencies.num-traits: v0.2.x - Float trait for generic f32/f64 operations
critical_dependencies.petgraph: v0.6.x - DAG construction with topological sort
critical_dependencies.rand: for synthetic data generation with seeded RNG
